segment.source: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS)'
segment.target: How to install the Internet Explorer 11 update using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS)'

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS)
segment.target: Install Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) using Windows Server Update Services (WSUS)

segment.source: Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) lets you download a single copy of the Microsoft product update and cache it on your local WSUS servers.
segment.target: Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) lets you download a single copy of the Microsoft product update and cache it on your local WSUS servers.

segment.source: You can then configure your computers to get the update from your local servers instead of Windows Update.
segment.target: You can then configure your computers to get the update from your local servers instead of Windows Update.

segment.source: For more information about WSUS, see Windows Server Update Services.
segment.target: For more information about WSUS, see Windows Server Update Services.

segment.source: To import from Windows Update to WSUS
segment.target: To import from Windows Update to WSUS

segment.source: Open your WSUS admin site.
segment.target: Open your WSUS admin site.

segment.source: For example, .
segment.target: For example, .

segment.source: Where is the name of your WSUS server.
segment.target: Where is the name of your WSUS server.

segment.source: Choose the top server node or the Updates node, and then click Import Updates.
segment.target: Choose the top server node or the Updates node, and then click Import Updates.

segment.source: To get the updates, install the Microsoft Update Catalog ActiveX control.
segment.target: To get the updates, install the Microsoft Update Catalog ActiveX control.

segment.source: Search for Internet Explorer 11 and add its contents to your basket.
segment.target: Search for Internet Explorer 11 and add its contents to your basket.

segment.source: After you're done browsing, go to your basket and click Import.
segment.target: After you're done browsing, go to your basket and click Import.

segment.source: You can also download the updates without importing them by unchecking the Import directly into Windows Server Update Services box.
segment.target: You can also download the updates without importing them by unchecking the Import directly into Windows Server Update Services box.

segment.source: To approve Internet Explorer in WSUS for installation
segment.target: To approve Internet Explorer in WSUS for installation

segment.source: Open your WSUS admin site and check the Review synchronization settings box from the To Do list.
segment.target: Open your WSUS admin site and check the Review synchronization settings box from the To Do list.

segment.source: Click Synchronize now to sync your WSUS server with Windows Update, and then click Updates from the navigation bar.
segment.target: Click Synchronize now to sync your WSUS server with Windows Update, and then click Updates from the navigation bar.

segment.source: Enter Internet Explorer 11 into the Search Contains box, and then click Apply.
segment.target: Enter Internet Explorer 11 into the Search Contains box, and then click Apply.

segment.source: Choose the right version of IE11 for your operating system, and click Approve for installation.
segment.target: Choose the right version of IE11 for your operating system, and click Approve for installation.

segment.source: Click each computer group you want to set up for the WSUS server, picking the right approval level, and then click OK.
segment.target: Click each computer group you want to set up for the WSUS server, picking the right approval level, and then click OK.
